message: How to Generate Barcode in ASP.NET by Amr Saafan
name: How to Generate Barcode in ASP.NET
caption: amrsaafan.blogspot.com
description: I will show you how to generate bar code images using .NET Built-in classes. You will not need a Third Party tool or external DLL library. As we all know that Barcodes depends on Fonts, there are plenty of them used for Barcodes. The most famous font for Barcode is "Code 39" and anyone can downloadâ€¦
